DataElement.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._This term is used informally to mean a class of things.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation._The code that identifies the kind of activity, drawn from a controlled list of possible values, which groups similar or related activities together.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._This term is used informally to mean a class of things.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: This term is used informally to mean a class of things.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/8/11 - no longer used by BRIDG; released for reuse by COPPA

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The code that identifies the kind of activity, drawn from a controlled list of possible values, which groups similar or related activities together.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The addition of somebody or something to, or the presence of somebody or something in, a group or mixture, particularly, a passive, usually temporary, product of cell activity within the cytoplasm or nucleus.

Concepts.definition: Medical and/or social characteristics which are necessary for a subject to be allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Meeting inclusion criteria is not a sufficient condition for entry or recruitment of a subject into the study. Characteristics limiting the eligibility of a subject for the clinical study must be considered.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An action or ministration that produces an effect or that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or ministration that produces an effect or that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/22/2021wz: released for UML model cleanup project.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Data Element Study Activity Category Code Category does not have Preferred Question Text
